long_description:
# Mosaic Planks for Mineclonia (mcl_mosaic_planks) ## Description Adds wooden mosaics for the remaining woods in Mineclonia (like Bamboo Mosaic). These mosaics can be crafted from the respective wood planks slabs. ### Crafting [\[ **Slab** \]]
[\[ **Slab** \]] → [ **Mosaic** ]
name: mcl_mosaic_planks
short_description: Adds wooden mosaics for remaining woods.
title: Mosaic Planks for Mineclonia
